name: Lasting Consequences
description:
It's a beautiful autumn morning, and you're walking to the bookstore to pick up Brick Chutkiss' new novel. Like all walks to the bookstore, adventure waits around every corner!

In this short interactive fiction story, every choice you make impacts your experience with the story in a way that you might not expect. You can always reach the end, but will you understand what's happening?

This game was made over the week of 11/1/2020, the eighth in my deck of many games, where I try to make a game a week, every week, for a year.
